full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA SDUD PA TSIGS SU BCAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @050A *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA SDUD PA TSIGS SU BCAD PA RDZOGS SO, , SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA KHRI BRGYAD STONG PA LAS PHYUNG BA'I 'PHAGS PA SDUD PA TSIG LE'UR BCAD PA 'DI, SLOB DPON SENG GE BZANG POS ZHU DAG MDZAD PA'I RGYA DPE DANG, BOD DPE DAG PA LA GTUGS NAS, ZHA LU LO TZA BA DGE SLONG DHARMA P'A LA BHA DRAS SLAR YANG DAG PAR BYAS PA'O,, ,,@050B AOm SVA STI, THUB DBANG ZHAL GYI PADMO LAS 'ONGS PA'I, ,SDUD PA MTSAN BRJOD BZANG SPYOD SMON LAM PAR, ,RGYU SBYOR DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAM CHOS DANG, ,PAR BRKOS DBU MDZAD KARMA DBANG 'DUS KYI, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS BCUR DAR BA DANG, ,PHA MAS THOG DRANGS MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO RNAMS KYIS, ,CHED DU BSAM NAS PAR DU LEGS BSGRUB PA'I, ,PAR 'DI DBUS GTZANG KUN BED GLING DU BZHUGS, ,DGE BA'I 'BREL THOG GYIS MTSON MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO, ,'KHOR LO BZHI LDAN RTEN BZANG RIM BRGYUD DE, ,BYANG SEMS YANG DAG LHA DANG RIM GNYIS SOGS, ,CHA TSANG LAM GYI BSGROD PA MYUR BAR SHOG ,MDO RIN 'DIS MTSON RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I TSOGS, ,JI SNYED BSAGS PA 'DI YI MYUR DU DAG ,@051A *, ,NOR BU'I BANG MDZOD SHAM BHA LAR SKYES NAS, ,BLA MED LAM GYI RIM PA MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI NI MDO SDUD PA'I PAR 'DI KHO BO LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES RANG GI RIM GROR DMIGS TE, 'GREL PA SOGS DANG BSDUR NAS DGE BAR BSGRIGS PA'I KHA BYANG SMON TSIG TU BRIS PA'O,, ,,SHU BHAm, ,)
